graphql.query:
mutation addCourse ($course: CreateCourseInput!) {
    addCourse (course: $course) {
        course_name
        course_number
        course_uuid
        credits
        dependencies {
            course_name
            course_number
            course_uuid
            credits
            dependencies {
                course_name
                course_number
                course_uuid
                credits
                institute_id
                instructor_name

                    course_name
                    course_number
                    course_uuid
                    credits
                    dependencies {
                        course_name
                        course_number
                        course_uuid
                        credits
                        institute_id
                        instructor_name
                        online_link
                    }
                    institute_id
                    instructor_name
                    online_link
                    prerequisites {
                        course_name
                        course_number
                        course_uuid
                        credits
                        institute_id
                        instructor_name
                        online_link
                    }
                }
            }
            institute_id
            instructor_name
            online_link
            prerequisites {
                course_name
                course_number
                course_uuid
                credits
                dependencies {
                    course_name
                    course_number
                    course_uuid
                    credits
                    dependencies {
                        course_name

                        course_uuid
                        credits
                        institute_id
                        instructor_name
                        online_link
                    }
                    institute_id

                    online_link

                instructor_name
                online_link
                prerequisites {
                    course_name

                    course_uuid
                    credits
                    dependencies {
                        course_name
                        course_number
                        course_uuid
                        credits
                        institute_id
                        instructor_name
                        online_link
                    }
                    institute_id
                    instructor_name
                    online_link
                }
            }
        }
        institute_id
        instructor_name
        online_link
        prerequisites {
            course_name
            course_number
            course_uuid
            credits
            dependencies {
                course_name

                credits

                    course_name

                    online_link

                course_name

                course_uuid

                dependencies {
                    course_name
                    course_number
                    course_uuid
                    credits
                    dependencies {
                        course_name
                        course_number
                        course_uuid
                        credits
                        institute_id
                        instructor_name
                        online_link
                    }
                    institute_id
